member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile
member.summary: Describes predefined profiles available for Abbyy OCR Engine.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.Default
member.summary: Sets all the processing parameters to the default values.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.DocumentConversion_Accuracy
member.summary:
Suitable for converting documents into an editable format (e.g. RTF, DOCX).
The settings have been optimized for accuracy: Best quality. Enables font style detection and full synthesis of the logical structure of a document.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.DocumentConversion_Speed
member.summary:
Suitable for converting documents into an editable format (e.g. RTF, DOCX).
The settings have been optimized for processing speed: Best quality. Enables font style detection and full synthesis of the logical structure of a document. The processes of document analysis and recognition are speeded up.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.DocumentArchiving_Accuracy
member.summary:
Suitable for creating an electronic archive (converting to PDF, PDF/A, PDF and PDF/A with MRC).
The settings have been optimized for accuracy: Enables detection of maximum text on an image, including text embedded into the image. Skew correction is not performed. Fonts and styles are not detected. Full synthesis of the logical structure of a document is not performed.
The profile is not intended for converting a document into RTF, DOCX, PDF text only. Use the document conversion profiles for such purpose.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.DocumentArchiving_Speed
member.summary:
Suitable for creating an electronic archive (converting to PDF, PDF/A, PDF and PDF/A with MRC).
The settings have been optimized for processing speed: Enables detection of maximum text on an image, including text embedded into the image. Skew correction is not performed. Fonts and styles are not detected. Full synthesis of the logical structure of a document is not performed. The processes of document analysis and recognition are speeded up.
The profile is not intended for converting a document into RTF, DOCX, PDF text only. Use the document conversion profiles for such purpose.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.BookArchiving_Accuracy
member.summary:
Suitable for creating an electronic library (converting to PDF, PDF/A, PDF and PDF/A with MRC).
The settings have been optimized for accuracy: Best quality. Enables font style detection and full synthesis of the logical structure of a document.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.BookArchiving_Speed
member.summary:
Suitable for creating an electronic library (converting to PDF, PDF/A, PDF and PDF/A with MRC).
The settings have been optimized for processing speed: Best quality. Enables font style detection and full synthesis of the logical structure of a document. The processes of document analysis and recognition are speeded up.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.TextExtraction_Accuracy
member.summary:
Suitable for extracting text from a document.
The settings have been optimized for accuracy: Enables detection of all text on an image, including small text areas of low quality (pictures and tables are not detected). Fonts and styles are not detected. Full synthesis of the logical structure of a document is not performed.
The profile is not intended for converting a document into RTF, DOCX, PDF text only. Use the document conversion profiles for such purpose.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.TextExtraction_Speed
member.summary:
Suitable for extracting text from a document.
The settings have been optimized for processing speed: Enables detection of all text on an image, including small text areas of low quality (pictures and tables are not detected). Fonts and styles are not detected. Full synthesis of the logical structure of a document is not performed. The processes of document analysis and recognition are speeded up.
The profile is not intended for converting a document into RTF, DOCX, PDF text only. Use the document conversion profiles for such purpose.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.FieldLevelRecognition
member.summary: Suitable for recognizing short text fragments. Currently this profile has default settings.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.HighCompressedImageOnlyPdf
member.summary:
Suitable for creating high-compressed PDF files which contain entire documents saved as pictures.
The following settings are used: Document recognition and synthesis of the logical structure of a document are not performed. Skew correction is not performed. PDF export is optimized for the minimum size of the resulting file. The entire document is saved as a picture (PEM_ImageOnly mode).

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.EngineeringDrawingsProcessing
member.summary:
Suitable for recognizing technical drawings. It takes into account large size and complexity of engineering diagrams, as well as possibility of different text orientation within the image. The profile is intended for converting such images into searchable PDF format.
The following settings are used: Enables detection of all text on an image, including text blocks of vertical orientation. Full synthesis of the logical structure of a document is not performed.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.PredefinedProfile.Version9Compatibility
member.summary: Provided for compatibility, sets the processing parameters to the default values of ABBYY FineReader Engine 9.0.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine
member.summary: The Abbyy OCR engine object is used for recognizing either machine printed or hand printed text within a scanned image using Abbyy FineReader OCR Engine.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new AbbyyEngine object

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.#ctor(Atalasoft.Ocr.IOcrFactory)
member.summary: Constructs a new AbbyyEngine object
member.param: A factory used for constructing page elements. The BasicOcrFactory class can be used for this.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.BoundAbbyyRegions
member.summary: This property how the PageLocation event will translate detected internal Abbyy regions into objects. A value of true will tends towards outputting larger objects with boundaries that correspond to the bounded rectangles of multiple related internal Abbyy regions. A value of false will always try to represent one internal Abbyy region with one individual object.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.ParallelProcessing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether parallel processing is enabled.
member.remarks: Parallel processing affects Recognize and Translate overloads that accept collection of images (through parameter). Please take into account that parallel processing requires more RAM than sequential processing. The general recommendation for a workstation is 350 MB * (cores number) + 450MB RAM, and if you are processing documents in Arabic or CJK languages — 850 MB * (cores number) + 750MB RAM. Parallel processing is disabled by default.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.RetainLayout
member.summary: Specifies if original lines in recognized text should be retained in the result. This property is false by default.
member.remarks: Layout retaining is applied to the following output file types: rtf, docx, odt, txt, html, pptx.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the engine.
member.remarks: The AbbyyLoader object much be constructed before the AbbyyEngine object is initialized. This is best done in a static constructor for a class. The AbbyyLoader object is passed in a path to the resources needed by the Abbyy engine and makes them available to the engine.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.Recognize(Atalasoft.Imaging.AtalaImage,System.Collections.Generic.List{Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextRegion})

summary.para: Recognize only within a specific regions in an AtalaImage.

member.returns: A new with objects for representing the contents of the recognized page and their co-ordinates
member.param: A list of in the image to focus on, each of which can be set with optional parameters for recognition

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.GetSupportedIcrRecognitionCultures
member.summary: Returns an array of supported ICR recognition languages for this engine
member.returns: An array of supported ICR recognition languages for this engine
member.remarks: Some engines provide languages for which there is no equivalent CultureInfo (Esperanto, for example) and therefore can't be reflected in this interface.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.AbbyyEngine.PredefinedProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets a predefined profile to be used during recognition.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.Abbyy.ThreeStateValue
member.summary: This enumeration denotes 3 different states that are to be used to set values for certain properties.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextRegion
member.summary: An abstract class to provide a common ancestor for ABBYY OCR engine related text region subclasses

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyOcrTextRegion
member.summary: AbbyyOcrTextRegion represents an area of printed text on a page, specific to the ABBYY OCR engine.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyOcrTextRegion.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyOcrTextRegion.#ctor(Atalasoft.Utils.Geometry.PolygonF)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyOcrTextRegion.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle,Atalasoft.Ocr.OcrTextRotation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.
The rotation of the text region with respect to the entire page.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion
member.summary: AbbyyIcrTextRegion represents an area of hand-printed text on a page with optional parameters specific to the ABBYY OCR engine.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion.#ctor(Atalasoft.Utils.Geometry.PolygonF)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle,Atalasoft.Ocr.OcrTextRotation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The bounding of the page element in pixels relative to the source image.
The rotation of the text region with respect to the entire page.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion.TextBorder
member.summary: The type of border that the text denoted by this region is enclosed in or delimited by. Default is SimpleText (no border)

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyIcrTextRegion.CellCount
member.summary: The amount of cells present in the region as a result of borders within the AbbyyIcrTextRegion delimiting individual characters. Default is 1 (all text is within one 'cell'/subdivision)

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder
member.summary: This enumeration defines different styles of border markings that can surround text in documents

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.CharBoxSeries
member.summary: This value specifies that the field where the text is located is a set of separate boxes.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.CombInFrame
member.summary: This value specifies that the field where the text is located is a comb and that this comb is also the bottom line of a frame.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.GrayBoxes
member.summary: This value specifies that the text is located within white fields on a gray background.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.PartitionedFrame
member.summary: This value specifies that the field where the text is located is a frame and that this frame is split by vertical lines.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.SimpleComb
member.summary: This value specifies that the field where the text is located is a comb.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.SimpleText
member.summary: This value denotes plain text.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.TextInFrame
member.summary: This value specifies that the text is enclosed within a frame.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Ocr.AbbyyTextBorder.UnderlinedText
member.summary: This value specifies that the text is underlined.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Ocr.AtalaFileWriter
member.summary: Represents a simple thin wrapper for to basically support ABBYY interface .
